statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE lawsuit_start_date < '2021-01-01' AND settlement_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE lawsuit_type = 'patent infringement';
DELETE FROM court_cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND court_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' AND court_name = 'Supreme Court';
DELETE FROM rulings WHERE ruling_date < '2021-01-01' AND ruling_description LIKE '%appeal%';
DELETE FROM lawsuit_parties WHERE lawsuit_id = 123 AND party_name = 'John Doe';
